title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in a large pot of boiling salted water.
Fry the pancetta in a pan until crisp.
Beat the eggs and mix in the cheese.
Drain the spaghetti and mix with the pancetta and egg mixture.
Season with pepper and serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate the chicken in yogurt and spices.
Grill the chicken until fully cooked.
Cook the onions in a pan, then add tomatoes and cream.
Mix in the grilled chicken and simmer for 10 minutes.
